mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, ZIP, ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, ADD_ZIP, ADD_ADDRESS, ADD_DETAIL_ADDRESS, TEL_NO, TO_CHAR(BIRTH_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS birthDate, NAME, RANK_NAME, MEMBER_DEL_FL, AUTHORITY, CATEGORY_YN FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, ZIP, ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, ADD_ZIP, ADD_ADDRESS, ADD_DETAIL_ADDRESS, TEL_NO, TO_CHAR(BIRTH_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS birthDate, NAME, RANK_NAME, MEMBER_DEL_FL, AUTHORITY, CATEGORY_YN, ADMIN_NAME, ADMIN_EMAIL FROM "MEMBER" LEFT JOIN ADMIN USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "MEMBER" VALUES( SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{zip}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, NULL, NULL, NULL, #{telNo}, #{birthDate}, #{name}, DEFAULT, NULL, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
